item.title: Let's Look at some Python!
item.description: No, not the snake!! In case that was triggering here is a picture of my dogs dressed like lions on Halloween. Time to do some actual codingâ€¦ In R library(reticulate) thats <- "I don't" And in python! me="like snakes!" print(r.thats,me) ## I don't like snakes! Thanks for reading my post! You just found out some super secretive information about me! Enjoy :)
